briefdescription.para: Processes the 10-byte GZIP header and any optional fields.

simplesect.para: true if the header is valid and optional fields were processed (or skipped).
false if the file is not a valid GZIP stream or required features are unsupported.

detaileddescription.para:
Loads the next byte from the file into the reader's 'byte' field. Resets 'currentPosition' to 0.
reader
Pointer to the initialized BIT_READER.
1 on successful load, 0 on EOF, -1 on read error.

Initializes the BIT_READER structure. Opens the file and resets the bit-reading state.
filePath
Path to the input file.
0 on success, -1 on failure (e.g., file not found).

Reads a single bit from the stream. Handles reading new bytes from the file when the current byte is exhausted.
reader
Pointer to the initialized BIT_READER.
The bit value (0 or 1), or -1 if the end of file is reached unexpectedly.

Closes the file handle and performs cleanup.
reader
Pointer to the BIT_READER structure.
